title: What songs’ chorus ends with “love you”? - Quora

response.answer_text: Crane’s Crying by Vitas. It’s in Russian but the chorus ends in I love You, not sure if that counts. But, you may want to try and listen to that, it’s actually a great song. Hope you will like it.
A great song that immediately comes to mind is an oldie but a goodie. It is the song “I Love You” by Climax Blues Band.
